Error.Message: Failed to bind.(Address already in use) Maybe other programs have already occupied this port
Error.Diagnosis: DAQ process maybe in the prev. run remains on COPPER, abort and try again. If the same error occurs, contact with DAQ(copper/ROPC) experts.

Error.Message: CORRUPTED DATA: Different event number over HSLBs
Error.Diagnosis: DAQ process maybe in the prev. run remains on $CPR010, abort and try again. If the same error occurs, contact with DAQ(copper/ROPC) experts.
Event # jump. Retry after ABORT and LOAD. If the same error occurs, contact with DAQ(copper/ROPC) experts
